titleStmt.title: The planter's speech to his neighbours & country-men of Pennsylvania, East & West Jersey and to all such as have transported themselves into new-colonies for the sake of a quiet retired life : to which is added the complaints of our supra-inferior inhabitants.
titleStmt.author: Tryon, Thomas, 1634-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle,

notesStmt.note: Originally published as part of Thomas Tryon's The country-man's companion.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
